1.content: A day you get up and you notice you are shrunk. You are in a room,but what room?
1.title: Shrink

choices: Nathan collects the clothes around you
12.content: You get up, you look at the sides and immediately you notice an awful smell, everything is huge, you don't know where you are, the ceiling is very far away, you decide that the best thing is to get up and find out where you are when you get up you discover that you are the size of an ant. That scares you, you do not know how they will see you at this size pro first you have to discover where you are, you start to walk there are many giant objects around you and it smells bad you approach one and discover where the smell comes from, it is a giant shoe, no But it's your 14-year-old brother Nathan's giant shoe. Right away you start thinking about how to get out of here you are on the floor surrounded by what you assume is a pile of dirty clothes you have to find a way to get somewhere where you can get their attention. But just at that moment CLACK the door will Habré and your gigantic brother appears s you can see that he has just come out of the shower, he is wet and he only carries the towel when he starts walking Thumthumthum you are scared you are right in his step you have to flee
12.title: Nathan room

info.description:
18 year old Tyler has been the size of a bug for the past few years. His family, for the most part, has kept him safe. Now, they often seem him as simply a bug, or even a servant, that is, if they remember he is there.....MAIN CHARACTER:

Tyler: 18 years old. 1 inch tall. Blonde hair. Skinny build.

TYLERS FAMILY:

BROTHERS;

Ben: 7 years old. Blonde hair. Average 7 year old. Youngest Brother.
Nathan: 14 years old. Dirty blonde hair. Average build. Smart, but with an evil side.
Conner: 19 years old. Brown hair. Skinny build. Gay. All around average, yet popular guy.
Jake: 24 years old. Brown hair. Jock type. Toned, well built body. Oldest Brother.

DAD;

Paul: 46 years old. Brown hair. Business man with average build. Loves his family. Forgetful of Tyler.


MALE ONLY

Everything goes, feet and crushing are encouraged.

PLEASE ADD, no one sentence chapters.
